sentences.sentence: He needs 51 percent to be reelected.
sentences.translation: 他需要51%的选票以再度当选。

sentences.sentence: James Rhodes was reelected governor of Ohio.
sentences.translation: 詹姆斯·罗兹再度当选俄亥俄州的州长。

sentences.sentence: Eisenhower did not take his advice, and was reelected.
sentences.translation: 艾森豪·威尔没有采用他的建议，并成功当选。
